column5:
Merge pull request #141 from Page-/fix-pty-version

Fix issue with pty.js 0.2.7 having been removed from npm.
Fix issue with pty.js 0.2.7 having been removed from npm.
hook into term.js's prefix mode keys.
move example and tests to term.js.
rm static/term.js and use the term.js module.

Merge pull request #88 from risacher/reverse-proxy-friendly

Reverse-proxy friendly
allow a custom escape key for browsers like dwb.

Merge pull request #66 from CyberShadow/fix-mc-arrow-keys

term.js: Ignore application keypad mode for arrow keys

Add potential fixes for #54.

This string will cause an error to be thrown when written:
^[[1;54r^[[H^[[11M^[[0;7m^O

It breaks down to these calls:
setScrollRegion([1, 54]);
cursorPos([1, 1]);
deleteLines([11]);
charAttributes([0, 7]);
setgLevel(0); // shift-in, 0x0f

^[[1;54r sets the scrollBottom to 54 which is bigger than the height of the
terminal (25 in the original issue). This may be due to a mismatch between what
the program thinks is the terminal height and what the terminal knows is its
height. In other words, it's the programs fault. We can add a failsafe for this
in multiple places.
include mit license in term.js. see #47.
fix terminal reset with event emitter.
get rid of express createServer warning.
stay up to date with express and socket.io
refactor, add -k option, set default rows to 24.
send SIGWINCH to processes during sync.
remove comments explaining a way to avoid handleDisconnect call.
use different inheritence, futureproof for express.
add glevel methods and eventemitter calls.
fully implement charset switching. fixes elinks bug. closes #28.
hook into key events instead of hooking key handler.
add experimental key hooks. fix misc event related things.
add shift modifier support to backspace and tab
fix device status cursor position reporting

Merge pull request #24 from pyrotechnick/patch-1

typos
refactor and add properties to constructor.
limit 256 colors sequence at 255. convert 88 to 256.
refactor doc name. update document title.
pass socket reference to Tab and Window
fix strange vt200 mouse bug with vim
rewrite bin/tty.js. daemonize from node instead of bash script.
improve mouse events. add support for urxvt, vt200, sgr events.
add dcs control sequences, ignore apc and pm.
remove unnecessary updateRange call. remove Terminal._colors.
implement 132 col mode. implement soft reset. refactor.
improve and enable csi ps c. improve prefix checks.
add experimental program-specific features. refactor term.
fix inverse. log and error functions. fix title setting.
refactor csi codes. remove unused variables.
refactor getRows. ignore DCS, APC, PM. fix broken bold.
hide h1 and #help on lights out
always show cursor after switching screen buffers.
make state machine more consistent. refactor.
add parentNode checks. fix tab switching.
refactor bin/tty.js. small fixes in term.js and tty.js.
hide grip when window is maximized
add userScript option. expose static/tty.js constructors.
move custom static middleware to top of stack
add cwd option. resolve symlinks better in bin/tty.js
simplify sessions to limit number of terminals
add hooks for auth. add hooks file option.
preliminary session work, add sync event
add workaround to allow right-click+paste in chrome.

Merge pull request #15 from bkase/shell_arguments

Added ability to give the shell arguments

Added ability to give the shell arguments

Specifically, I added an optional parameter to the config.json file.
warn when writing to dead terminal. refactor.
always serve up to date options.js
keep terminal windows maximized when resizing browser window.
clear terminals on reconnect. check for dead terminal on resize.
use shift+pgup, shift+pgdown to navigate scrollback
only poll visible tabs for process name
improve tab buttons. highlight on activity.
set tab button title. pass ^A^A to the terminal. remove ctrl-drag.
add custom termName option. refactor lib/tty.js
urxvt keys for tab navigation. maximize.
remove term class. fix default fg. rename termReverse.
temporarily add default bg/fg to the colors array
make the default bg/fg colors 16 and 17 respectively. fixes #9.
fix resizing with regards to cols
dont remove terminal during cursor repaint
miscellaneous fixes. bold box bug check.
add comments for potential default bg/fg fix
always remember attribute flag when resetting fg/bg
a more accurate inverse and positive attribute
avoid multiple focus calls. use mousedown instead of click.
add terminal options: visualBell, popOnBell, cursorBlink, scrollback.
fix terminal background during resize. clean up static/tty.js
improve config handling. add hostname option.
allow specific shell path or process
allow custom stylesheet. use favicon middleware. dont send config event.
implement better way of exposing options to the client
always refresh cursor blink timer on keypress
better logging. failsafe for kill event.
don't reset pressed button on wheel, bind to document's mousemove
add tango terminal icon for favicon
hook term.focus better, ensure focus during mouse events
close when a terminal's grip is shift-clicked
dont use cursorHidden for hiding the cursor on focus
fix bindmouse arguments, remove redundant call to applyconfig
outdent, use break statement instead of else: git diff -w
add xresources parser to config. set up a default config schema.
send clientside config to the browser
move serverside terminal to separate file
add auth and https support. read config from ~/.tty.js
always refresh after ^M. fixes scrolling stutters in vim and man.
fix parameter access in csi functions
refactor term.js, get rid of some comments
rename some functions in pty.cc, set master fd to non-blocking
use net.Socket instead of fs.ReadStream for pty fd
stop using a table to render the term. improves firefox performance.
add attribute sequences for reset fg and bg
change default TERM to xterm. readme, version.
add experimental support for xterm mouse events
add rectangle, column, and device status csi codes.
add properties, refactor constructor and reset
add ! prefix. csi ps j, csi ps b.
keep current attribute when deleting/inserting chars, tab behavior.
comment unimplemented csi codes. bump to version 0.0.5.
keep attributes while erasing characters. implement ^[K1-2.
scroll CSI codes. fixes scrolling in irssi when TERM=xterm.
dont erase the wrong line when deleting lines
add DEC drawing charset. getting closer and closer to full xterm compatibility.
fix some compatibility issues when TERM=xterm
use tango colors, add 2 missing csi codes, fix typo.
ioctl header regardless of OS. bump version for npm.

Merge pull request #4 from jrozner/master

Fix Build Bug
move postfix check to avoid extra parameters
change comments. add ESC control comments.
added missing header for OS X to call ioctl()
add all remaining xterm CSI codes. more verbose comments
add support for bold and underlined text
expose pty resize functionality to js-land
add postfix support for csi. add dcs, pm, apc. handle osc better
add more ESC codes, ascii characters
fix prefixes, ability to hide cursor
clean things up a bit, add variables

Merge pull request #1 from jrozner/master

Ignore build files and fix start script
extend state machine, add more csi codes.
ignore build dir and lock file
improve lib/tty.js, use TERM=linux by default
fix term name argument in pty.cc
potentially make things more cross platform
add comments to term.js, rename function
